channel.title: Testimonials on Pricing - Datadog
channel.description: Recent content in Testimonials on Pricing - Datadog

item.title: AdRoll
item.description: “Datadog has been instrumental in managing our real-time infrastructure, globally distributed in 5 data centers across hundreds of instances, and thousands of different metrics and dimensions for each host. I can’t believe there was a time when we didn’t have Datadog.”
